name: Withholding Tax Summary on Sales
query:
SELECT si.posting_date as "Date:Date:",
       sii.item_name as "Perticulars:Data:", 
       si.name "Voucher No:Link/Sales Invoice:", 
       sii.base_net_amount as "Amount:Currency:", 
       sii.base_net_amount * (sii.withholding_tax_rate/100) as "Withholding Tax:Currency:",
       si.tra_control_number as "Contol Number:Data:",
       si.witholding_tax_certificate_number as "Contol Number:Data:",
       si.tax_id as "TIN Number:Data:"
FROM `tabSales Invoice` si LEFT JOIN `tabSales Invoice Item` sii ON si.name = sii.parent 
WHERE si.docstatus = 1
AND   si.is_return = '0' 
AND   sii.withholding_tax_rate > 0
AND   si.posting_date >= %(from_date)s 
AND   si.posting_date <= %(to_date)s
